_meanings:
{@--1@} A kind of tree, 
Mimusops Elengi, (said 
according to the convention of poets
to put forth blossoms when 
sprinkled by young women with 
mouthfuls of wine); {#kAMkzatyanyo#} ({#kesaraH#} or
{#bakulaH#}) {#vadanamadirAM dohadacCadmanA'syAH#}
<ls>Me. 78</ls>; {#bakulaH sIDugaMqUzasekAt#} ( 
{#vikasati#}); (for similar conventions
about other trees see the quotation
under {#aSoka#}).

The fragrant flower of this tree;
<ls>Bv. 1. 54.</ls>
